entry.source: {F812}Isabeau\0{F87A,170}{F87B,170,7,1,1}{F813,0,275001}Is this... Mikado Castle?{F801}{F802}{F87B,170,10,1,1}{F813,0,275002}We've returned to the Eastern Kingdom{F801}of Mikado...{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Isabeau\0{F87A,170}{F87B,170,7,1,1}{F813,0,275001}Is this... Mikado Castle?{F801}{F802}{F87B,170,10,1,1}{F813,0,275002}We've returned to the Eastern Kingdom{F801}of Mikado...{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Isabeau\0{F87A,170}{F87B,170,10,1,1}{F813,0,275004}It is very like the Great Spirit{F801}of Hope.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,275005}This must be the Great Spirit of{F801}Goodwill that was changed into God's{F801}chariot...{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Isabeau\0{F87A,170}{F87B,170,10,1,1}{F813,0,275004}It is very like the Great Spirit{F801}of Hope.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,275005}This must be the Great Spirit of{F801}Goodwill that was changed into God's{F801}chariot...{F801}

entry.source: 〉 The Great Spirit of Goodwill flew{F801}towards {F843,0}...{F801}
entry.target: 〉 The Great Spirit of Goodwill flew{F801}towards {F843,0}...{F801}

entry.source: 〉 Obtained the Great Spirit of Goodwill.{F801}
entry.target: 〉 Obtained the Great Spirit of Goodwill.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Isabeau\0{F87A,170}{F87B,170,4,1,1}{F813,0,275006}Well then, {F843,0}, I will part ways{F801}with you for the nonce.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,275007}I want to persuade the people of the{F801}Eastern Kingdom of Mikado to move to{F801}Tokyo.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Isabeau\0{F87A,170}{F87B,170,4,1,1}{F813,0,275006}Well then, {F843,0}, I will part ways{F801}with you for the nonce.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,275007}I want to persuade the people of the{F801}Eastern Kingdom of Mikado to move to{F801}Tokyo.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Isabeau\0{F87A,170}{F87B,170,4,1,1}{F813,0,275011}I trust that you can gain the Great{F801}Spirit of Spite without me.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Isabeau\0{F87A,170}{F87B,170,4,1,1}{F813,0,275011}I trust that you can gain the Great{F801}Spirit of Spite without me.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Isabeau\0{F87A,170}{F87B,170,1,1,1}{F813,0,275012}And once the matter is settled... Hm...{F801}{F802}{F87B,170,10,1,1}{F813,0,275013}Let us reconvene at Cafe Florida in{F801}Shinjuku.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Isabeau\0{F87A,170}{F87B,170,1,1,1}{F813,0,275012}And once the matter is settled... Hm...{F801}{F802}{F87B,170,10,1,1}{F813,0,275013}Let us reconvene at Cafe Florida in{F801}Shinjuku.{F801}

entry.source: 〉 You decide to part ways with Isabeau.{F801}
entry.target: 〉 You decide to part ways with Isabeau.{F801}

entry.source: ここで善意の大魂を表示したいです{F801}
entry.target: ここで善意の大魂を表示したいです{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Burroughs\0{F87A,2}{F813,0,400063}Looks like the quest is going well.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Burroughs\0{F87A,2}{F813,0,400063}Looks like the quest is going well.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Isabeau\0{F87A,170}{F87B,170,6,1,1}{F813,0,275008}Don't worry... I doubt I'll need any{F801}assistance in this.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Isabeau\0{F87A,170}{F87B,170,6,1,1}{F813,0,275008}Don't worry... I doubt I'll need any{F801}assistance in this.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Isabeau\0{F87A,170}{F87B,170,6,1,1}{F813,0,275014}I shall see you by and by.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Isabeau\0{F87A,170}{F87B,170,6,1,1}{F813,0,275014}I shall see you by and by.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Isabeau\0{F87A,170}{F87B,170,9,1,1}{F813,0,275009}There are no more Luxurors. And the{F801}angels have lost their masters...{F801}{F802}{F87B,170,4,1,1}{F813,0,275010}It strikes me as the ideal moment for{F801}us to emigrate to a new land.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Isabeau\0{F87A,170}{F87B,170,9,1,1}{F813,0,275009}There are no more Luxurors. And the{F801}angels have lost their masters...{F801}{F802}{F87B,170,4,1,1}{F813,0,275010}It strikes me as the ideal moment for{F801}us to emigrate to a new land.{F801}
